name: STprototype
description:
STprototype is a 6dof game inspired in Sidonia no Kishi art (just a little bit) were you'll have to reconnect yourself with other bots like you but with different abilities so you are STRONGER TOGETHER destroying enemy ships in a BULLET HELL. 

This game isn't finished. I had some other cool ideas for this game but at now is not completed coz i didn't had so much time this week. In fact is my first game jam and i have to say that i learnt a lot with this event.

If you're interested with this project and maybe want to see finished content let me know with thumbs up, good ratings, comments (I don't know how Ithc.io works XD).

Thanks in advance.

Controls:

- W A S D to move

- Mouse to point

- Left Mouse to shoot.

-Right Mouse to "Block"
